alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 24 at 5:47PM MST until July 24 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 630 PM MST. * At 547 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 14 miles east of Freeman to 11 miles northwest of Chui-Chu to near Casa Grande to near Arizola, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 165 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 150 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 163. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Casa Grande, Coolidge, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Queen Creek, Arizona City, La Palma, San Tan Valley, Seville, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Arizola and San Tan Mountain Park. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
